scripts.install: npm install --save-dev babel-core babel-loader babel-preset-es2015 browser-sync css-loader fast-json gulp gulp-debug gulp-imagemin gulp-jslint gulp-plumber gulp-sass gulp-sourcemaps gulp-watch html-webpack-plugin node-sass sass-loader style-loader webpack webpack-dev-server
scripts.uninstall: npm uninstall --save-dev babel-core babel-loader babel-preset-es2015 browser-sync css-loader fast-json gulp gulp-debug gulp-imagemin gulp-jslint gulp-plumber gulp-sass gulp-sourcemaps gulp-watch html-webpack-plugin node-sass sass-loader style-loader webpack webpack-dev-server
